Gabe is a very professional technical recruiter. He worked with me every step of the way and helped me find a great job in my field, Information Technology. He is very diligent and was quite helpful throughout the process of matching my skills and experience with a job that fits me well and which I enjoy greatly. In all my interactions with him, he's always been  professional, kind, had a great work ethic, and been and a joy to work with. He's great at what he does. I feel confident enthusiastically recommending him to you, and know he would be a real help if you are seeking a job in the IT field meeting your qualifications. He would be a great asset to any company considering him for employment as a technical recruiter or similar position. My experience with him has been overwhelmingly positive and I would gladly work with him again if the opportunity arose in the future.

summary: TEKsystems is a premier technology staffing and services company and is best known for their ability to help businesses implement their technology, whether it’s simply providing an individual or the assumption of responsibility for a discrete project. Part of Allegis Group® Inc., the 6th largest staffing company in the world, TEKsystems has grown to become a multibillion-dollar company by blending superior client service with an unrivaled ability to source and manage talent to precise specifications. TEKsystems’ core ability to deploy high-caliber IT and communications expertise across a full portfolio of service offerings including Staffing Services, Global Services, Workforce Management Services, and IT Services is unequaled.TEKsystems' is located in over 100 offices throughout the United States, Canada, and Europe, and includes more than 20,000 IT and communications professionals supporting over 3,000 clients worldwide. Visit TEKsystems at www.teksystems.comThe types of people and positions include:- IT Management Positions:Project Manager, Program Manager, IT Manager, Operations Manager, Test Manager, Head of Operations, Head of IT, Software Development Manager, Network Manager, Network Consultant, Infrastructure Manager, Applications Manager, Business Analyst- IT Applications:Test Analyst, Software Tester, .net Developer, Web Developer, Web Programmer, Oracle DBA, SQL DBA, Developer, Software Engineer, Applications Support, C# Developer, VB.net Developer, ASP.net Developer, PHP developer, Flash developer- IT Infrastructure:Infrastructure Analyst, Network Engineer, Network Security Analyst, Server Analyst, Server Engineer, Microsoft Consultant, Technial Architect, Systems Engineer, UNIX Systems Administrator, Systems Admin, System Support, First Line Support, Second Line Support, 3rd Line Support, Helpdesk, Service Desk Analyst, Data Analyst, Deployment Engineer, Rollout Engineer, Field Engineer, Desktop Support
